abstract: Google’s new online tool allows people to embody a cartoonish online avatar and have text-based conversations with other Internet users in virtual chat rooms.
snippet: Google’s new online tool allows people to embody a cartoonish online avatar and have text-based conversations with other Internet users in virtual chat rooms.
lead_paragraph: Google, known for its plain-Jane approach to Web design, has come up with something much wackier.

headline.main: Google Introduces a Cartoonlike Method for Talking in Chat Rooms
headline.print_headline: Google Introduces a Cartoonlike Method for Talking in Chat Rooms
